alert.note: Alert for Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND WEST CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near North Lewisburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... West Mansfield, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Raymond, Pottersburg, New Jerusalem, Pickrelltown, Broadway, Middleburg and East Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
